text: Julius Henry Marx or Groucho Marx (October 2, 1890 â€“ August 19, 1977) was an American actor and comedian. He was best known for work with his siblings in The Marx Brothers and then later on his own. He was also best known for portraying a fast-talking "wise guy" with bushy eyebrows, glasses, rectangle moustache, and a cigar. title: Groucho Marx
